definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The Premier deputed the Foreign Minister to act as his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 總理委派外交部長作爲他的代表。

sentences.english: He will deputize for the foreign minister.
The South Korean Foreign Minister Kim Sung-hwan also said that he suspected that there were additional nuclear facilities in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 韓國外交部長金星煥也懷疑朝鮮還有另外的核設施。

sentences.english: Foreign Minister Li Zhaoxing and other officials were present at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 外交部長李肇星等會見時在座。

sentences.english: Chinese Vice Foreign Minister Cui Tiankai simply called the sinking "unfortunate".
sentences.chinese: 而中國副外交部長崔天凱僅表示沈船事件令人遺憾。

sentences.english: Now he holds the office of Foreign Minister.
sentences.chinese: 他現在擔任外交部長職務。

sentences.english: Chinese Foreign Minister Li Zhaoxing once composed a poem at Cabo da Roca.
sentences.chinese: 中國的外交部長李肇星曾經在羅卡角賦詩一首。

sentences.english: Foreign Minister Fahmy was barely discernible at the bottom of the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 外交部長法赫米站在舷梯下面，隱約可見。

sentences.english: Chinese Foreign Minister Li Zhaoxing led a delegation to attend the conference and delivered a speech.
sentences.chinese: 中國外交部長李肇星率團與會並發表了講話。

sentences.english: That brought a tough warning from Israeli Foreign Minister Avigdor Lieberman.
sentences.chinese: 以色列外交部長利伯曼以強硬警告迴應了這一說法。

sentences.english: On 6 May, Iran'sforeign minister Manouch–ehr Mottaki hosted a New York dinner for security council members.
sentences.chinese: 6日伊朗外交部長穆塔基在紐約設宴款待安理會成員。

sentences.english: Among those who lost their seats is Singapore's Foreign Minister George Yeo.
sentences.chinese: 在失去議席的人之中包括新加坡外交部長楊榮文。

sentences.english: The delegation was headed by our Foreign Minister.
sentences.chinese: 這個代表團由我們的外交部長任團長。

sentences.english: The talks have been upgraded to the foreign-minister level.
sentences.chinese: 會談已經上升爲外交部長級。

sentences.english: Sweden's Foreign Minister Carl Bildt is a former member of Lundin's board of directors.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典外交部長比爾特曾經擔任過這家公司的董事。

sentences.english: The Indian foreign minister says elements in Pakistan are responsible for the attacks.
sentences.chinese: 印度外交部長說巴基斯塔基地組織對這此襲擊負責。

definition: foreign minister/secretary of state/minister of foreign affairs
Minister of Education/Director of Education Department
to swear the oath of office
governor (of a province or colony)/US state governor/premier (Australian states)
